content: "Create a surreal digital art portrait of a mermaid standing on a rock, overlooking a vast, mystical ocean. The mermaid should be depicted with a graceful, flowing tail and long, flowing hair, with a serene expression on her face. Behind her, a shimmering, iridescent portal opens up into a dreamlike underwater world, filled with schools of colorful fish and other exotic sea creatures. Use a vibrant, psychedelic color palette and a style inspired by vaporwave art."
